name: ttyd-ubuntu
short_description: Terminal sharing over web - access Ubuntu bash shell from any browser.
description: ttyd is a simple command-line tool that allows you to share your terminal over the web. This Ubuntu-based image gives you a full bash shell accessible from any modern browser. Features include clipboard support, scrollback buffer, SSL/TLS support, authentication, and resize handling. Perfect for remote demonstrations, teaching, troubleshooting, or giving temporary shell access without setting up SSH.
usecases: Give someone remote terminal access without SSH setup.
Demonstrate command-line tools to students or colleagues.
Run interactive CLI tools from any browser.
Quick remote access without key management.
notes: Full Ubuntu environment in the browser
